chapter.title: Using the MyBatis API
chapter.para:
Use this option with care because wrong usage may produce runtime errors or, much worse, data integrity problems. These are the caveats:
It will not participate in any Spring transactions.
If the SqlSession is using a DataSource that is also being used by a Spring transaction manager and there is currently a transaction in progress, this code will throw an exception.
MyBatis default SqlSession is not thread safe. If you inject it in your beans you will get errors.
Mappers got from MyBatis default SqlSession are not thread safe either. If you inject them it in your beans you will get errors.
You must make sure that your SqlSessions are always closed.
